briefTitle: Safety, PK and Effectiveness of IV Peramivir Versus Oseltamivir in Pediatric Subjects With Uncomplicated Influenza
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Open Label, Active-controlled Study to Evaluate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Effectiveness of IV Peramivir Compared to Oral Oseltamivir in Pediatric Subjects With Acute Uncomplicated Influenza
summary: This study will evaluate the safety, pharmacokinetics and effectiveness of a single dose of IV peramivir compared to a standard 5 day course of oral oseltamivir in the treatment of pediatric subjects with acute uncomplicated influenza.

primaryOutcome.measure: Safety and Tolerability, as Measured by the Number of Participants Experiencing Adverse Events.
